title: MLA हफ़ीज़ खान पर नर्स से ईमाम के पैर धुलवाने का ग़लत आरोप, चोटिल शख्स का हो रहा था इलाज
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim: @narendramodi@AmitShah@drharshvardhan is this how healthcare workers to be treated in India? Person in center of this photo is Kurnool MLA Abdul Hafeez Khan of YSR Congress. Will you take action against this gross illtreatment of Health workers in India? pic.twitter.com/vfbn656NwX
